name: @railgun-community/curve25519-scalarmult-rsjs
description: Node.js addon for Curve25519 scalar multiplication written in Rust
author: RAILGUN Contributors

scripts.build-debug: rm -rf dist && nj-cli build && mv dist/index.node ./index.node
scripts.build-release: rm -rf dist && nj-cli build --release && mv dist/index.node ./index.node
